Catalano.Imaging.Filters

Class BernsenThreshold

  • java.lang.Object
    • Catalano.Imaging.Filters.BernsenThreshold
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBaseInPlace

    public class BernsenThreshold
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBaseInPlace
    Bernsen Threshold. The method uses a user-provided contrast threshold. If the local contrast (max-min) is above or equal to the contrast threshold, the threshold is set at the local midgrey value (the mean of the minimum and maximum grey values in the local window). If the local contrast is below the contrast threshold the neighbourhood is considered to consist only of one class and the pixel is set to object or background depending on the value of the midgrey.
